subject: Exceptionininitializererror
msgSnippet: In my test class, when I try to instantiate this certain class I get ExceptionInInitializerError. The superclass of this class has a static block. I can
messageBody:
In my test class, when I try to instantiate this certain class I get
ExceptionInInitializerError. The superclass of this class has a static
block.
I can instantiate it fine outside of the test method and cannot see why
this is happening. Can anyone shed some light on this problem?

Thankyou,
Chris.
